name: Wizard Run (aaronmilly)
description:
Game Name: Wizard Run

Develops: Aaron, Sam, and Will

This is a 2D game where you try to get 500 points in the least amount of time.  You are trying to collide with the coins with your character who is a wizard.  If you collide with the rocks, then the game is over.  It fits the theme "running out" because your avatar can "run out" of the screen, but enter on the other side.  This was our first game with no programming experience, so we apologize for any glitches and unfinished developments.  Enjoy!
